Terms and conditions for MedCheck Welcome to MedCheck! Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the MedCheck mobile application (the “App”). By downloading, installing, or using MedCheck, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the App. By accessing or using MedCheck, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time, and your continued use of the App constitutes acceptance of any such changes. MedCheck is a medication management application that helps users track their medications, dosage schedules, refill requests, and relevant medical information. The App also provides general information about medications but does not provide professional medical advice. Always consult your healthcare provider for any medical concerns or questions. Accurate Information: You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information when using the App. Failure to do so may result in incorrect medication tracking or notifications.\nMedical Advice Disclaimer: The information provided by MedCheck is for informational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare providers with any questions you may have regarding your medications or a medical condition.\nCompliance with Laws: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using MedCheck. You may not use the App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. To use certain features of the App, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for any activity that occurs under your account. You agree to notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized access to your account. Your privacy is important to us. By using MedCheck, you agree to the collection and use of your personal information as outlined in our Privacy Policy. This includes information related to your medications, prescriptions, and usage history. MedCheck may send you notifications regarding medication schedules, refill reminders, and other important updates. You are responsible for managing your notification preferences in the settings section of the App. All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property rights related to the MedCheck App are owned by us or our licensors. You may not use, copy, modify, or distribute any of the content without our express permission. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time without notice, for any reason, including violation of these Terms and Conditions. Upon termination, your right to use MedCheck will immediately cease.\n MedCheck may integrate with third-party services such as pharmacies, healthcare providers, or external databases (e.g., OpenFDA). We do not control and are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of any third-party services. Your use of such services is governed by their respective terms.\n\n MedCheck is provided on an “as-is” and “as-available” basis. We make no warranties, whether express or implied, regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the App. We are not liable for any damages, including but not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, arising from your use or inability to use the App.\n\n Frequently asked question(FAQ) Termination of Contract Third Party Services Limitation of Liability Application Notifications Data Privacy User Account User Responsabilities About MedCheck Acceptance of terms and conditions Welcome Keep track of your dosage history to ensure you\'re taking medications as prescribed. Track Your Dosages Never forget to take your medication with customizable reminders that fit your schedule. Medication Reminders Find the nearest pharmacies to your location, complete with directions and contact information. Search for Nearby Pharmacies With just a few clicks, you can request refills for your prescriptions at your preferred nearby pharmacy. Refill Your Medications You can now search for medications by name and get detailed information including usage, dosage, and warnings. Language Select Time New pharmacy This app helps users manage their medications by tracking doses and sending refill requests. 1. What is this app? 2. How do I set reminders for my medications? You can set reminders in the settings section of the app, where you can customize your reminder times. 3. Can I add my own medications?
Dashboard Preferences Calendar About Med Medication
Yes you can add medications manually through the Add Medication feature in the app.
